title: FEA Material Data Extractor
description: IronPython script for Ansys ACT with a GUI that automates the process of calculating substitute material properties based on FEA simulations.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio built with HTML, Tailwind, and DaisyUI. Features dynamic UI effects, animated project cards, and responsive layout.

title: SAP Data Extractor
description: A GUI-based tool that extracts and organizes data directly from SAP systems for engineering or business use.

title: 2D FEA Solver
description: A custom solver for static 2D finite element analysis written in C. Supports triangular meshes and custom material input.

title: Budget Manager App
description: A lightweight web app for tracking income and expenses with real-time charts and categorized financial entries.
